thread.title: UEFA probes racism claims against Lokomotiv Moscow
thread.title_full: UEFA probes racism claims against Lokomotiv Moscow - World - Sports - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: UEFA probes racism claims against Lokomotiv Moscow
text:
European football's governing body UEFA is investigating Lokomotiv Moscow over allegations of "racist behaviour" by fans during the Russians' 2-0 win over Albanians Skenderbeu last week.
Lokomotiv supporters are accused of having "chanted racist, anti Albanian-Kosovar songs" during their Europa League pool clash on October 1, a spokesman told AFP.
The Russians' case will be heard on October 15.
